flavorText: The Zhalfirin war triangle represents a trinity of might, faith, and guile.
name: Triangle of War
originalText: {2}, Sacrifice Triangle of War: Target creature you control fights target creature an opponent controls. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

rulings.text: If either target is illegal when the ability resolves, it will do nothing.
